subject: Pro not working
description_text: Hello, I have had my pros for 1 year and up till now they have been fantastic but all of a sudden they are not recognised in any game but the Simsonn software is picking them up can you help in anyway Stephen Elward Hello I have had my pros for 1 year and up till now they have been fantastic but all of a sudden they are not recognised in any game but the Simsonn software is picking them up can you help in anyway Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Stephen Elward, If your pedal is version 1.7.1, you can download the latest SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2 using the link below. Then, follow the steps below to update the firmware: If the software indicates that the version is too old, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu to start the firmware update; After the firmware update is completed, release the upgrade button; Finally, test the pedal and perform a calibration. Additionally, please ensure that your computer is properly grounded. https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download
Hi mate thanks for the reply If I try to update to *proxultra.sfu* its says i need to contact administrator On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 05:18, support@simsonn.com
Hi Stephen Elward, Please select plus.sfu when performing the firmware update.
Yea I have tried that it says connected but will not register in ANY game On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 14:09, support@simsonn.com

Hi Stephen Elward, In SIMSONN Manager 2.1.3, after calibrating the pedals, please check whether the blue progress bar moves normally from 0% to 100% when you press the pedal. If it does, this indicates that the pedal itself is working correctly and can be properly bound and used in the game. May I ask which game you are currently using? https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

F125, race room, acc and leman I will check when I get home from work tomorrow I am devastated as I love your product so much infact I have even convinced a few I race with to purchase so when I will get home I will check and get back to you On Wed, 7 Jan 2026 at 15:43, support@simsonn.com

Hi Stephen Elward, If it still doesn’t work, you can install ToDesk, and I can assist you remotely to check and resolve the issue. No registration is required—just provide the connection ID and the temporary access code.
Hello and thanks for al your help did some digging and it was a bad usb driver thank you ever so much love your products take care On Thu, 8 Jan 2026 at 01:35, support@simsonn.com
